column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I got a mimosa
column4: the infamous fruity pebbles French toast to split with my boyfriend. Mimosa was good
column5: when is not good? Haha the chilaquiles was good
column6: but not something I would come back for again and again. The showstopper was definitely the French toast. We were able to get the bacon on the side since I'm a vegetarian
column8: it was so good. Definitely recommend the ice cream on top if you get it! I would definitely come back for that yummyness.
